titleStmt.title: A remonstrance to the creditors of the Common-wealth of England, concerning the publique debts of the nation.
titleStmt.author: Chidley, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: From my House in Bow-lane, London, this 19 of December, 1653. S: Chidley.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
